data.eml:eml: Kyphosus gladius, a new species of sea chub from Western Australia (Teleostei: Kyphosidae), with comments on Segutilum klunzingeri Whitley

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Knudsen, Steen Wilhelm, Clements, Kendall D. (2013): Kyphosus gladius, a new species of sea chub from Western Australia (Teleostei: Kyphosidae), with comments on Segutilum klunzingeri Whitley. Zootaxa 3599 (1): 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.218950
